Henrique Hefler

Hello, my name is Henrique, and I am a freelancer developer. Currently, on the path to becoming a full-stack dev, I created this little website to show a bit of what I know. My abilities ( which have to do with computers ) are all listed below, and I will feed this page often with new features that correspond to the abilities.

HTML5 and CSS3

The base for any front-end. Made the clone of a lot of websites in order to learn how to use both these tools.

Bootstrap

This little website was done using bootstrap. It is a nice library to make things responsive.

SASS

Sass is a great tool to make the css more flexible and readable. I like to use on my projects because it simplify the work.

Javascript

The most "back-end" thing i am learning by now. Like to use with JQuery to make things easyer.

Ruby

I'm on my way to learn Ruby.

Hability One

very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32.
